decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that order with or without modification), no window(s)/door(s) shall be installed in the flank elevation(s) of the development hereby permitted without the prior permission in writing of the local planning authority.

The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the dormer and window frames hereby permitted shall match those used in the external surfaces of the existing roof and building.

The development hereby approved shall be commenced and undertaken on both properties at the same time and shall be completed on both properties within a period of no more than 2 years from commencement.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:PL Combined Existing & Proposed Elevations entitled Drawing;PL Proposed Elevations & Floor Plans entitled Drawing: BD/23/07/5;PL Proposed Elevations & Floor Plans entitled Drawing: BD/23/07/3A;PL Proposed Front Elevation & Section Plans entitled Drawing: BD/23/07/4; PL Location Plan received;

The development hereby permitted shall be begun
before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Alterations and extension to raise ridge height of both No.27 & No.29: No.29: rear dormer; two rooflights in front roofslope; window in end gable
